thread.section_title: TrekEarth - South America Travel Photo Gallery
thread.title: Luxury

title: Luxury
text:
Only registered TrekEarth members may write critiques. Photographer's Note 
The "Parque Cidade Jadim" condominium, is a real estate development of high luxury. It comprises 8 residencial buildings plus 3 comercial buildings. The condominium have a luxury Mall (where I was to take the photo) with stores of international rename. From the Mall roof top we have this pretty view of the residencial buildings and looking to the other side the city lights. The apartaments have sizes from 250 square meters till the huges 1880 square meters. All buildings have several kind of services. The Bussines buldings have heliport. A 650 square meters apartament cost R$ 12,5 million (almost 8 million dolars) 
Nobody has marked this note useful
